text: Anderson in 2017 Ray Anderson is the athletic director at Arizona State University since January 2014.http://espn.go.com/college- sports/story/_/id/10270525/ray-anderson-named-athletic-director-arizona-state- sun-devils He graduated from Stanford University, where he lettered in football and baseball, and Harvard Law School.https://thesundevils.com/staff.aspx?staff=3 ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:African-American college athletic directors in the United States Category:Arizona State Sun Devils athletic directors Category:Stanford Cardinal baseball players Category:Stanford Cardinal football players Category:Harvard Law School alumni
title: Ray Anderson (athletic director)
